CustomField.description: If checked output builder when sending reports to an email belonging to a user (whether in the to, cc, or bcc fields) will send the email directly to that user to avoid the email counting towards the daily limit on emails sent.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked output builder when sending reports to an email belonging to a user (whether in the to, cc, or bcc fields) will send the email directly to that user to avoid the email counting towards the daily limit on emails sent.
CustomField.label: Use Intelligent Email Limit Management
